court: vss IN THE HIGH COURT OF JUDICATURE AT BOMBAY ORDINARY ORIGINAL CIVIL JURISDICTION In the matter of the Companies Act, 1956 And In the matter of M/s.Alcock Ashdown & Company Limited (in liquidation) Official Liquidator s Report Mr.K.Shroff and Hema Desai i/b Singhvi & Co. for Bank of Maharashtra Mr.B.B. Parekh for Official Liquidator Mr.S.K. Mishra i/b V.B. Tiwari & Co. for State Bank of India Mr.S.C. Gupta, O.L. CORAM: SMT.NISHITA MHATRE, J. SMT.NISHITA MHATRE, J. SMT.NISHITA MHATRE, J. DATED: DECEMBER 15, 2005 DECEMBER 15, 2005 DECEMBER 15, 2005 P.C.: P.C.: P.C.: . The Official Liquidator has sought permission to release the amount of Rs.65,38,798.74 to Bank of Maharashtra subject to the their furnishing an undertaking to the Official Liquidator that if any amount is required to be paid by the Liquidator in Suit No.972 of 1973, that will be refunded by them in consonance with the order of 26.8.1975. An amount of Rs.1,06,25,871/- is invested with the Bank of Maharashtra in the name of Prothonotary & Senior Master, High Court, Bombay. The Official Liquidator seeks a : 2 : direction that the invested amount should be paid over to the Official Liquidator in order to release the amount to the Bank of Maharashtra in accordance with the orders of this court. 2. The Prothonotary & Senior Master to withdraw the amount of Rs.65,50,000/- from Bank of Maharashtra out of the amount of Rs.1,06,25,871/- invested and pay the same to the Official Liquidator. The amount of Rs.65,38,798.74 shall be paid over to the Bank of Maharashtra by the Official Liquidator subject to the Bank furnishing an undertaking to the effect that the amount will be returned in the event the Official Liquidator is required to pay the amount in Suit No.972 of 1973.
